page.title: 18Parents and adults leisure.
page.content: The facilities in the villages provide enjoyment for many of the adults. On the sporting scene many people like to visit the local{swimming pool}and this proves to be very popular in the evenings and weekends. Within the area there are a number of {public houses}and these provide focal points for socialisation.Some of these pubs provide restaurant and bar snack services. Those who wish to take home food may choose from fish and chips or Chinese food. There are two{social clubs}and mostly men frequent these to play darts and snooker. There are many clubs in the Stansted catering for all ages. Those who wish to stay at home tend to their gardens and allotments.Others watch T.V, knit and do needle craft.
